name: CreateGithubUserProjectBoard
description:
Create a project board for a GitHub user.

This tool creates a project board for an authenticated GitHub user. It returns a `410 Gone` status if the user does not have existing classic projects, or `401 Unauthorized` if privileges are insufficient.

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The name for the GitHub project board to be created. It should be a string representing the desired name.

parameters.name: project_body
parameters.description: The content or description of the GitHub project board. It should be a concise string summarizing the project's purpose or details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
